name: Threat Chain: Data Staging to Exfiltration
query:
sequence by host.id with maxspan=1h
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.name == "T1074.001 - Suspicious Staging Directory Creation"]
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.name == "T1005 – Data from Local System"]
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.name == "T1074.001 – Staging Sensitive Files"]
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.name == "T1560.001 - Staged Data Compressed in Linux"]
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.name == "Auditbeat Process-Based Exfiltration (T1041)"]
description: Detects a complete threat chain from staging directory creation, finding sensitive files, staging them, compressing, and finally exfiltrating. Correlates alerts from 5 distinct rules.
